Reviews.Title: Walmart Sale 1/27/13
Reviews.Author: K. Lentini
Reviews.Content: The Straighttalk Galaxy Sll prepaid smartphone went on sale today at Walmart for $299.00.  I paid $349 three weeks ago.  Went to Walmart today and they credited $50 to my card. I love this phone and the $45 monthly everything plan.

Reviews.Title: Adding on to the others
Reviews.Author: Matthew Siebert "~Author and Critic"
Reviews.Content: Unscrupulous to sell this for so high, its 350 at walmart or the straight talk website. Dont waste your money here.

Reviews.Title: Cost
Reviews.Author: n3
Reviews.Content: Your requested price is too high! You can get this product at walmart with a bonus starter kit for 349.99.  If you were to adjust your price I would make an offer.  This is for a christmas gift. what a shame.

Reviews.Title: Way too expensive
Reviews.Author: MiataJerry
Reviews.Content: Walmart carries it at $349. I bought it and love the phone.  It does everything I need and then a lot more.  The pebble finish back seems better than the SIII's smooth surface.

Reviews.Title: Best Phone At&t; Service
Reviews.Author: Guadalupe Lujan
Reviews.Content: This Phone is Excellent Just Buy it Previous 4S user 45$ Unlimited Talk Text Web 4G Gorilla Glass Still Uses Gingerbread But Worth the Price 45$ Month

Reviews.Title: Liked and wanted the phone.
Reviews.Author: Louise D. Robinson
Reviews.Content: There was a problem with Straight Talk and being able to communicate with the service representative. The StraitTalk representative's decision was that the SIMS card needed replacing and there was a promise to send a new one. We finally did receive an envelope with no card and a piece of paper with instructions!  However, our "point of salesperson" for the phone was more than willing to work with us and did allow us to return the phone after we made a different purchase.

Reviews.Title: Best Android value in Straight Talk, uses AT&T; towers
Reviews.Author: Cable Monkey
Reviews.Content: Let's be honest: Straight Talk is not at the cutting edge of technology or customer service.  But they do have excellent pricing and some decent mid-level smartphones.  For my purposes and budget, this is the best phone in the Straight Talk line.I was considering the Straight Talk Samsung Galaxy SIII, but that more expensive model uses Sprint towers exclusively.  This Straight Talk Galaxy SII uses AT&T; towers which have much better reception in my area.I definitely recommend using a sturdy case such as an Otterbox to protect this phone since the Galaxy S-series phone screens tend to crack after multiple drops.

Reviews.Title: I'm confused...
Reviews.Author: Jess
Reviews.Content: I don't get where all of u ppl are seeing this phone for $350. I looked on both Walmart and straight talk websites and both sites still have this phone priced at $399.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, on a decent service
Reviews.Author: Roger
Reviews.Content: I have had the Straight Talk variant of the Galaxy S2 since November of 2012.Attracted to the benefits of a hgh-end smartphone on a prepaid network, I chose this phone after much debating over similar phones on Straight Talk, Virgin, Boost, etc. Comparing specs, the networks, and the prices effectively granted me a smartphone to meet my needs. Here are my opinions on the product;Pros:Affordable and off-contractHigh end specs that still compete after 2 yearsNever experienced lagg on any mainstream appCamera takes beautiful pictures and videosThe features are uncountable, always sated my needsWeb browsing is a breezeI get 12 mb/s on the AT&T; Network that this phone runs off of. (HSPA+)Crystal clear call qualityCons:Battery life could be better, I'm a heavy user and my phone sometimes dies in 3 hours. But again I do 3d gaming on it.Speaker could be better, distorts a bit at high volumes which is common.Screen is bright and pretty, but its not HD resolution at 480x800Outdated Android version (I use Cyanogen mod which puts my phone at 4.3)Phone can get VERY hot at times, and make my face sweat.Overall I'm happy with my little pocketbuddy, who is realiable, resilient, and stylish.Would DEFINATELY recommend this phone to a friend (And I have!)

Reviews.Title: Loving My Phone!!
Reviews.Author: Theresa Williams
Reviews.Content: This phone is great! Love all the new things I can do with it. Glad i bought it. A great buy.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Kawiloje
Reviews.Content: Absolutely fantastically capable phone. Very smart. High enough android version to download nearly anything in the app store.Battery life is a bit of a problem if you can't keep this device out of your hand.

Reviews.Title: Still android 2.3.6 GINBRD
Reviews.Author: teddy near
Reviews.Content: The boost mobile one is only 329$ for 55$ m/ulmtd w/shrinkage for newbies to boost or less depending how far  you are into your shrinkage plan. plus it has android 4.0.4 plus comes in titanium and white colors and 4g on wimax capable.but straight talk aka tracfone is just barely getting into 3g.shoot even metro pcs is better than straight talk because of the tmobile merger

Reviews.Title: Sansung Galaxy SII Prepaid Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Patricia Lunday
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use with Straight Talk Service. I love it because I can do everything the more expensive companies charge for for only $45 a month. Not too happy that it uses AT&T; towers, as they don't work well in my area.

Reviews.Title: Too Expensive
Reviews.Author: ConnieM
Reviews.Content: You can buy this phone brand new at Walmart or from the Straight Talk web site for $349.00 or $369.00!!!!!!I will not pay this price knowing it's less expensive else where. I already own this phone(it's an amazing phone)and I'm trying to purchase as Christmas present.

Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: that's a ridiculous price for a s2.walmart offers it now for 280 online.that wont get a sale unless they are desperate or stupid.

Reviews.Title: WAS LOCKED TO AT&T.;
Reviews.Author: Don Powell
Reviews.Content: I AM KEEPING THIS PHONE EVEN THOUGH IT WAS LOCKED TO AT&T.; I LIVE IN A VERIZON AREA. ALL THE OUTSIDE LABELS HAD BEEN TORN SO YOU COULD NOT READ THAT IT WAS AN AT&T; PHONE UNTIL YOU OPENED IT. NOW IT'S TOO LATE TO RETURN IT. OH WELL!!

Reviews.Title: Worth the $ paid!!!!
Reviews.Author: Michael serfass
Reviews.Content: Excellent value for the money paid. Plenty of Ram memory, device memory, and also 12gb of internal sd card memory a plus. Also no problems with speed or lagging with the fast 1.2 ghz processor. Only slight drawback is the battery life when gaming or heavy web browsing.

Reviews.Title: where are sim cards??
Reviews.Author: rhoda wilson
Reviews.Content: purchased 2 of these phones....would have been nice to know that they didn't have sim cards with them...now im waiting on sim cards to come from straighttalk and we know how long that can take!!!!! so make sure befor buying this phone it has sim card

Reviews.Title: such a great phone
Reviews.Author: Thalia Meza
Reviews.Content: The Straight Talk Samsung Galaxy S 2 in gray is not just a great looking phone but it also has everything that we were looking for in a android phone,it has incredible camara and good resolution, we love it.

Reviews.Title: hurt
Reviews.Author: eddie
Reviews.Content: the phone wouldn't get the internet I had to send it to stright talk to get another phone if you want information ill send it to you its been almost a month without a study phone to use I am disappointed in your company and amazon for not in specting the items for sale on there site this  is the second time in a month this has happen to me I feel cheated twice I still don't have a phone to use I sent the phone to plainfield return center because I put insurance on the phone not knowing the phone wouldn't get the internet again I feel cheated

Reviews.Title: Horrible!!
Reviews.Author: Travis Trepanier
Reviews.Content: Phone doesnt work.... Wont allow me to use internet . And phone just randomly wont allow me to receive or make calls. Junk. Im trying to re activate one more time or I am sending it back!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: cheaper elsewhere
Reviews.Author: brosky14
Reviews.Content: Now this phone is only $279 at Walmart and Straight Talk websites. Don't waste your money here. Walmart has the S3 for $350.

Reviews.Title: Price reduced
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: The phone can be brought at Walmart for the low low price of 299.00, I just picked up one and the thing is money.  Hope it drops in price even more with the passage of time.

Reviews.Title: bad phone and service
Reviews.Author: HUSTLExMAN_JOE
Reviews.Content: I would warn anyone to stay away from this phone, I made the mistake of buying it without researching closer, and would have know that the phone is not a dual band phone, meaning that u don't even have 3g or 4g and can't toggle between the too, instead the phone is locked into something called H+, and u should get great call and text signal, but the internet and data is something different, It always crash unless connected to wifi, and the H+ aka HSPA does not allow u to connect to internet well at all, I switched to the the boost mobile GS2 and its way better with the software update and no internet crashes and I can turn 4g on and off and just use 3g if I like, but you'll be upset with straight talk after a month or 2 tops with this phone because it will fail and they don't do any software updates at all and that is essential

Reviews.Title: love love love them
Reviews.Author: charley beer
Reviews.Content: my brother order  these phones and we love them soooo much.... great deal.... i love the samsung galaxy s 2 ......

Reviews.Title: wondering about phone
Reviews.Author: Hope Bullock
Reviews.Content: Does this phone have a front screen camera where u can do skype or face time? Could someone please let me know about this featurethanks!

Reviews.Title: ON SALE from $279.99 to $299.99
Reviews.Author: Petey Chicago
Reviews.Content: Virging Mobile has Samsung Galaxy S2 at $279.99 with 4.0 Ice-cream Sandwich thru March 11th 2013 and Wal-mart has Galaxy S2 with 2.0 Ginger Bread at $299.99.  Both still way cheaper than listed price here.

Reviews.Title: Not a normal SII
Reviews.Author: John J. Topper "Topper"
Reviews.Content: There are three million reviews on the Galaxy SII, so I will start with the important detail about this specific one.First, this is an ATT phone. While it does not entail an ATT subscription, it uses their infrastructure. If you want to know if it will work somewhere, try an ATT phone there.Also very important to note is that there are several models of the SII. This particular one is the S959G, and that implies one very important detail. While other S2'are upgradable to android 4.1, this one IS NOT UPGRADABLE. It comes with Gingerbread, and that's it. There will not be an update now or in the future..As for the phone itself, it is solid, feels well built and runs reliably. The platform is fast enough and stable. Not many glitches to speak of. It's worth it up to about $150. Beyond that you can get more for the money.

Reviews.Title: Straight Talk Galaxy S2.
Reviews.Author: emilyy17
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone at walmart for $199.00, but I love this phone. It is well worth the money. The screen is the perfect size. Love the front camera. I have had no problems with dropped or lost calls. I have been with straight talk since they first came out. By far this is the best phone that i have had. I would reccomend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Christmas
Reviews.Author: Bob N
Reviews.Content: I wanted this phone and on Amazon they wanted to charge me 300.00$ and at Walmart it was 199.00 so yeah great phone but I ended up getting a different phone

Reviews.Title: cost, price
Reviews.Author: Ann42633
Reviews.Content: Was thinking about getting this phone, so was checking reviews on it. Walmart has this phone for $279.99 now. Why is yours so high?

Reviews.Title: added description plz!
Reviews.Author: seicke
Reviews.Content: needs to say in description what areas it will work in. after I received it is when I found out would not work in my area. :-(

Reviews.Title: RIPOFF
Reviews.Author: mattsreviews
Reviews.Content: WALMART HAS SAME PHONE FOR $299.00 GO TO WALLY WORLD, THIS IS A JOKE THIS PRICE... I WOULD NOT BUY AN ITEM FROM A COMPANY THAT TAKES ADVANTAGE OF PEOPLE

Reviews.Title: cheaper somewhere else
Reviews.Author: wanda
Reviews.Content: Can get this phone at wal-mart so much cheaper this is a rip off...why would I want to pay this much when I can get it else where cheaper.
